version_description:
Fixed the impossible to hit buttons in Robot Rock and Technologic games.

If you missed the latest new feature it is:
Record and share your jam sessions or your gameplay in the game modes.

Fixed the impossible to hit buttons in Robot Rock and Technologic games.

If you missed the latest new feature it is:
Record and share your jam sessions or your gameplay in the game modes.

Updated for iOS 12+
Temporarily removed the side scroll jumper. Will be added back when it is updated for iOS 12+.
Removed recording feature as it is no longer supported.

Updated for iOS 12+
Temporarily removed the side scroll jumper. Will be added back when it is updated for iOS 12+.
Removed recording feature as it is no longer supported.

Updated for iOS 11+
Added back side scroll jumper - AKA "Beat Box".

Updated for iOS 11+
Added back side scroll jumper - AKA "Beat Box".

Fixes delayed start of Technologic beat in jam mode.
Fixes too low volume of background music.
Fixes out of sync samples with background music in GH mode.
Fixing menu buttons sometimes not responding in Beat Box mode.

Fixes delayed start of Technologic beat in jam mode.
Fixes too low volume of background music.
Fixes out of sync samples with background music in GH mode.
Fixing menu buttons sometimes not responding in Beat Box mode.

Perspective view in the GH games with lanes lighting up when notes are hit!

Fix for banner ads in some cases still showing after "Remove Ads" has been purchased.

Perspective view in the GH games with lanes lighting up when notes are hit!

Fix for banner ads in some cases still showing after "Remove Ads" has been purchased.

Fix for app freezing after scene change in some cases.

Rewarded videos: Watch videos for in-app credits which can be used to remove the ads (if any).
Now also supporting devices with iOS 9+ for those who felt left out!

Rewarded videos: Watch videos for in-app credits which can be used to remove the ads (if any).
Now also supporting devices with iOS 9+ for those who felt left out!

Minor updates and fixed links.
Note: The reported "issue" about sound not working is most likely because the device silence button is respected. This issue will get some attention for the next release.

Audio when mute button is active.

Checking if app switch is possible when clicking the TikSongs icon. Else takes you to the App Store.

Thanks to all for playing iDaft Jamming and sharing your experience! :)

By popular demand:

AROUND THE WORLD!

...including a guided mode.

By popular demand, Crescendolls has been added as a soundboard.

You can now also record and playback your jamming sessions from some of the soundboards.
Guides to more of the soundboards have also been added.
